category.pattern: *MY SALARY IF I WILL UPDATE MY ACCOUNT NUMBER AFTER 22ND OF THE MONTH*
category.template:
It's best to update the bank details as soon as you're onboarded - and definitely by the 22nd of the month. Go here: https://smartpay.allsectech.com/Accenturelogin/SmartLogic/memberlogin.aspx and follow the path Allsec -> Utilities -> Master Setup -> Bank Account Details. This way, you will have your salary credit in the same month. However, if you're unable to do this before the 22nd of the month, don't worry! Your salary will be credited by the 7th of the following month and will appear in that month's pay slip. The account number details will also start showing on your salary slip from the subsequent month. Remember - all payments (salary, reimbursement) will be made to a single account and that account must be in your name only.

category.pattern: *WHAT IS TAX DECLARATION AND WHY WE NEED TO SUBMIT THE TAX PROOF*
category.template:
Let me focus on this for a moment. To avail tax exemption and reduce tax liability, you will need to declare investments in the beginning of the financial year. At the end of the financial year, you will be required to submit your investment proof documents to retain the tax exemptions. The investments done during the respective income tax financial year April to March can be claimed for a tax benefit. Have fun tax planning!

category.pattern: *WHO WILL BE ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE BASE PAY INCREASE ON 1ST DEC 2017*
category.template:
Any employee who joined on or before 30th April 2017 is eligible for a base pay increase for Levels 11 and above. For Level 12 and 13 - 1st December 2016 is the cut-off date.

category.pattern: *WHERE CAN I VIEW MY FINAL REWARDS DECISIONS*
category.template:
Final Rewards details post December cycle will be available on 1.Allsec - via Base pay and Variable pay letters, The revised compensation details by component will be available on the Compensation statement. 2.You will also be able to view - Talent outcome and Compensation statement on Performance Achievement tool. Both will get released by November end/ December 1st week. The compensation plan will be enabled on Allsec Portal in first week of December.

category.pattern: *WHAT ARE THE FACTORS THAT AFFECT MY HIKE*
category.template:
Base pay hike is determined by your performance and gap from market target for your role/ level. Variable pay awards are determined by your performance in the past period.
COMPBEN5

category.pattern: *HOW DO I KNOW IF MY SKILL IS NEXT GEN ELIGIBLE AND I WILL GET THE BONUS*
category.template:
All employees who are eligible and not eligible for Next Gen will receive a Next Gen letter through AllSec by Dec 1st week. The Next Gen skills are not listed anywhere. It applies to levels 8 to 11 only, based on primary skill mapping (as per mycompetency of given cut-off date). CL11 will get eligible for the program once they have completed at least 1 year in the organization/ post promotion from CL12 to 11.

category.pattern: *WHAT DO I DO IF MY UTILIZATION IS 0 DUE TO BEING SHADOW LOCKED; HOW DOES THIS IMPACT MY VARIABLE PAY*
category.template:
If the utilization is zero then your variable payout will be impacted, since UT is one of the factors considered to compute eligible earning. The floor value in terms of utilization is 52.6percentage (50percentage/95percentage) and the ceiling is 115.8percentage (110percentage/95percentage) will be applied for calculation of eligible earning. 95percentage is the target utilization.
